attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that all civilian airline aeroplanes landing at sites in the UK are carrying a roof mounted anti-personnel missile which is activated to follow the line of any laser beam pointed from the ground into the cockpit of an aeroplane which is attempting to land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is the ONLY way to deal with this developing problem.  The technology is available, lets do it.  They shine a laser beam into an aircraft cockpit, they die, the ONLY appropriate treatment.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
